report.title: Taxon observation format for RESTful API
report.description: Report to support taxon-observations resource output for the RESTful API. Compatible with the standard report filter parameters.
report.query: select #columns# from occurrences occ -- for access to external_key left join cache_occurrences_functional o on o.id=occ.id left join cache_occurrences_nonfunctional onf on onf.id=occ.id left join cache_taxa_taxon_lists cttl on cttl.id=o.taxa_taxon_list_id left join cache_samples_nonfunctional snf on snf.id=o.sample_id join websites w on w.id=o.website_id left join groups g on g.id=o.group_id left join sample_attribute_values dn on dn.sample_id=o.sample_id and dn.deleted=false and dn.sample_attribute_id=#dataset_name_attr_id# #agreements_join# #joins# where #sharing_filter# and o.date_type in ('D','DD','O','OO','Y','YY','-Y','U') and (snf.entered_sref_system ilike 'osgb' or snf.entered_sref_system ilike 'osie' or snf.entered_sref_system = '4326' or snf.entered_sref_system = '27700') and o.taxa_taxon_list_external_key is not null #idlist#

column.name: gridReference
column.sql: case when snf.entered_sref_system in ('4326', '27700') then null else replace(coalesce(snf.public_entered_sref, onf.output_sref), ' ', '') end

column.name: east
column.sql: case when snf.entered_sref_system in ('4326', '27700') then st_x(st_transform(st_centroid(o.public_geom), snf.entered_sref_system::int)) else null end

column.name: north
column.sql: case when snf.entered_sref_system in ('4326', '27700') then st_y(st_transform(st_centroid(o.public_geom), snf.entered_sref_system::int)) else null end

column.name: projection
column.sql: case upper(snf.entered_sref_system) when '4326' then 'WGS84' when '27700' then 'OSGB36' when 'OSIE' then 'OSI' else upper(snf.entered_sref_system) end

column.name: precision
column.sql: case snf.entered_sref_system when '4326' then 50 when '27700' then 1 else case length(replace(snf.public_entered_sref, ' ', '')) when 5 then 2000 else pow(10, (12-length(replace(coalesce(snf.public_entered_sref, onf.output_sref), ' ', '')))/2) end end
